name: LootChest
author: Kastellan

Use-Item-Rarities.description: Let items spawn in common, rare, and legendary sizes

Enable-Lights.description: Rare and legendary spawns will have lights when opened

Debug-Text.description: Announces when loot chests are reset

commands.name: /resetlootchests
commands.description: Respawns all loot chests on the server. Authorized users only.
